| ------------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- | ----------- |

| `hideLabel`  | `hide-label`  |                                                                       | `boolean`      | `false`     |
| `label`      | `label`       | A label describing the progress bar.                                  | `string`       | `undefined` |
